Prerequisite: Small or Tiny Size*

  • You can move into a space occupied by an ally of at least one size category larger than you, and they don't count as difficult terrain.

  • You can end your turn in a larger ally's space (but only one creature can hide in this way in an ally's space).

  • You can take the Hide action to hide inside a larger ally's space.

  • If the you or the ally moves or you otherwise reveal yourself, you are no longer hidden.

*@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-ancestries.Item.5J70jqdcPoefooCf]{Halflings}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-ancestries.Item.gLMz1sUsPKDR5va5]{gnomes}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-ancestries.Item.XuPuqt4zdmRI9AoV]{goblins}, and @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-ancestries.Item.Yi1Yx8nufuwTH4Ts]{kobolds} are always small. @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-ancestries.Item.Q5ZdCOpVALEWGIvH]{Aasimar}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-ancestries.Item.Rk6Hr2pRg5QdNTMk]{changelings}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-ancestries.Item.1N4Kd56zar6xNXgI]{constructs}, genasi, and @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-ancestries.Item.tZ0SDZjnnHjs3p4F]{tieflings} can be small or medium.
